// Problem Code : Binomial Coeffecients
// Problem URL : http://www.codechef.com/problems/CB01/
#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;

#define M 1009
int mod = 1009;
int c[M][M];

typedef unsigned long long uint64;
typedef long long int64;

int main()
{
	for(int i = 0; i < M; ++i)
	{
		c[i][0] = c[i][i] = 1;
		for(int j = 1; j < i; ++j)
			c[i][j] = (c[i - 1][j] + c[i - 1][j - 1]) % mod;
	}
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
			uint64 n, k;
			cin >> n >> k;
			int r = 1, r1, r2;
			while(n > 0 || k > 0)
			{
				r1 = n % 1009;
				r2 = k % 1009;
				n /= 1009;
				k /= 1009;
				if(r1 < r2)r = 0;
				else r = (r * c[r1][r2]) % mod;
			}
			printf("%d\n", r);
	}	
	return 0;
}
